properties.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 8 at 3:39AM EST until January 8 at 1:00PM EST by NWS Cleveland OH
properties.description:
* WHAT...Snow occurring. Additional snow accumulations of up to
two inches. Blowing snow is likely to reduce visibilities below
a quarter mile at times with winds gusting as high as 40 mph.

* WHERE...Northern Erie county.

* WHEN...Until 1 PM EST this afternoon.

* IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Areas of blowing
snow could significantly reduce visibility. The hazardous
conditions could impact the morning commute.
properties.instruction:
Slow down and use caution while traveling.

The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can
be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

The Pennsylvania Department of Transportation and Pennsylvania
Turnpike Commission remind motorists to adjust speeds based on
driving conditions as winter weather impacts Pennsylvania
roadways. Visit www.511pa.com for the latest travel, roadway, and
traffic conditions.

NWSheadline: WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 1 PM EST THIS AFTERNOON
